## Here is the list of Drosophila cell cycle genes

This was downloaded from <https://github.com/hbc/tinyatlas/blob/master/cell_cycle/Drosophila_melanogaster.csv>.

## Uploading library

```{r}
#| message: false
library(data.table)
library(AnnotationDbi)
library(org.Dm.eg.db)
```

## Data import
```{r}
cc<- fread(file ="cellcycle_dm.csv", header=TRUE)
```

```{r}
cc = subset(cc, select = -(modified) )
```

```{r}
ccdata <- as.data.frame(cc) %>%
  column_to_rownames("geneID") 
has_rownames(ccdata)

```


```{r}
cc$gene = mapIds(
  org.Dm.eg.db,
  keys = rownames(ccdata),
  column ="SYMBOL",
  keytype = "FLYBASE",
  multiVals = "first"
)
```

## Saving a new file
```{r}
fwrite(cc, file = "./cellcycle_genes.csv")
```
